title: Query parser doesn't warn about unmatched ')'
description: If there is an unmatched '(', as in protein 'foo( bar', the query parser reports an error. But if you search for 'foo) bar', everything after the unmatched ')' seems to be ignored!

comments.content: Eric, I think this is a duplicate of LUCENE-372.
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
